transform-origin: top center !important; width: 100% !important; max-width: 800px !important; /* 限制最大宽度 */}/* 解决高度截断问题 *//* 移除之前添加的高度限制代码 */body { overflow: visible !important; /* 确保可以滚动 */ height: auto !important; min-height: 500vh !important; /* 给body足够的高度 */}html { overflow: visible !important; height: auto !important;}/* 为整个文档添加足够的高度 */.post-content, .article-entry { min-height: 200vh; /* 确保有足够的高度 */ overflow: visible;}/* Core PDF content styles */.pf, .pc { position: relative; overflow: visible;}.pc.opened { display: block; }/* Text rendering */.t { position: absolute; white-space: utility classes */.c { position: absolute; border: 0; padding: 0; margin: 0; overflow: hidden; display: block; }.d { position: absolute; transform-origin: 0 100%; }._ { display: inline-block; color: entry.title: Documentation
entry.content:
Elegant and Powerful Theme for Hexo

Theme NexT has the following features:

  • Vanilla JavaScript.
  • Support native dark mode.
  • Support Pjax to deliver a fast browsing experience.
  • Integrated MathJax and KaTeX mathematical formula rendering.
  • Integrated PDF.js and mermaid diagram.
  • Support Disqus, Changyan, LiveRe, Gitalk, Utterances and Isso comment systems.
  • Support a large number of third-party statistics services.
  • Easy to switch CDN provider.
  • Easy to customize content or modify style.

Four Schemes in One

By using different Schemes in NexT, you can simply change the style of your blog, and nearly all options can be used in all schemes.

Multilingual Support

Thanks to the contribution of our users and developers, NexT now supports over 20 languages.

entry.content: <!DOCTYPE html><!-- Created by pdf2htmlEX (https://github.com/pdf2htmlEX/pdf2htmlEX) --><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><head><meta charset="utf-8"/><meta name="generator" content="pdf2htmlEX"/><meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1"/><style type="text/css">/*! * Base CSS for pdf2htmlEX * Copyright 2012,2013 Lu Wang <coolwanglu@gmail.com> * https://github.com/pdf2htmlEX/pdf2htmlEX/blob/master/share/LICENSE *//* Remove sidebar completely */#sidebar { display: none !important; }#page-container { position: relative; left: 0 !important; height: auto !important; overflow-x: auto !important; /* 添加水平滚动 */ margin: 0 0 8000px 350px; /* 居中显示 */ padding: 20px; box-sizing: border-box; transform: scale(2) !important; /* 不要放大，或者最多1.2倍 */ transform-origin: top center !important; width: 100% !important; max-width: 800px !important; /* 限制最大宽度 */}/* 解决高度截断问题 *//* 移除之前添加的高度限制代码 */body { overflow: visible !important; /* 确保可以滚动 */ height: auto !important; min-height: 500vh !important; /* 给body足够的高度 */}html { overflow: visible !important; height: auto !important;}/* 为整个文档添加足够的高度 */.post-content, .article-entry { min-height: 200vh; /* 确保有足够的高度 */ overflow: visible;}/* Core PDF content styles */.pf, .pc { position: relative; overflow: visible;}.pc.opened { display: block; }/* Text rendering */.t { position: absolute; white-space: pre; transform-origin: 0 100%; -ms-transform-origin: 0 100%; -webkit-transform-origin: 0 100%; unicode-bidi: bidi-override;}/* 禁用所有图片和背景的点击事件 */.bi, .bf, #page-container img { pointer-events: none !important; cursor: default !important;}/* 禁用所有可能的点击元素 */#page-container a,#page-container [onclick],#page-container [href] { pointer-events: none !important; cursor: default !important;}/* Essential utility classes */.c { position: absolute; border: 0; padding: 0; margin: 0; overflow: hidden; display: block; }.d { position: absolute; transform-origin: 0 100%; }._ { display: inline-block; color: entry.title: Welcome to the NexT Organization!
entry.content:
Welcome to the NexT documentation site! NexT is a high quality elegant theme for Hexo. It is crafted from scratch, with love.

User Guide

It’s easy to set up NexT theme. Just follow documentation and create your personal website!

Community

Connect with us and be part of our growing community!

  • Telegram Group (Chinese Language): Click here to join!
  • Discord Server: Join our Discord!
  • Gitter: Join our Gitter chats!

Feedback

  • Visit the Awesome NexT list to share plugins and tutorials with other users.
  • Join our GitHub discussions.
  • Add or improve translation in few seconds.
  • Report a bug in GitHub Issues.
  • Request a new feature on GitHub.
  • Vote for popular feature requests.
entry.summary: Welcome to the NexT documentation site! NexT is a high quality elegant theme for Hexo
